wikipedia_page.main: Robert Herbert (Bob) Griffiths (born 1953) is a Church in Wales priest: he has been Archdeacon of Wrexham since 2014.He was born in Rhyl. He studied for ordination at Chichester Theological College. After  a curacy in Holywell he was a Chaplain to the Forces from 1979 until 1987. After this he served at Llanfair Dyffryn Clwyd, St Asaph and Llanrhos.

response: *Bob Griffiths (born 1953), born in Rhyl, Church in Wales priest, British Armed Forces chaplain, then Archdeacon of Wrexham
*Bob Griffiths (writer) (born 1938), American author, playwright and professional speaker
